channel.title: How to get any game you wan't free
channel.description:
What you will need: 1. a gun
Go into EB games and scream "EVERYONE GET ON THE FUCKING FLOOR!" and shoot the ceiling. break off the security camera. Steal the games. Shoot the manager.
phr33 games ftw.
